mainText:
Steve and his company have pioneered many things that have made our world a better place. From the time I was in elementary school through my career as a journalist, I have utilized many of Apple’s systems and still enjoy using Apple equipment when given the chance.
The loss of Steve’s vision, his pioneering spirit, and his desire to create advanced technology for the good of all will be greatly missed.
header: Sorry to hear about Steve's passing
author: Eric
